snippet: Accusations against President Park Geun-hye’s main spokesman have upset South Koreans, who see sexual harassment as a widespread problem.
abstract: South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye apologizes over scandal in which her main spokesman Yoon Chang-jung is accused of sexual abuse and indecent exposure in Washington hotel during her state visit; accusations have upset South Koreans, who see sexual harassment as widespread problem.
lead_paragraph: Accusations against President Park Geun-hye’s main spokesman have upset South Koreans, who see sexual harassment as a widespread problem.

headline.seo: South Korean Leader Apologizes for Aide’s Behavior
headline.main: South Korea’s Leader Apologizes for Aide’s Behavior in U.S.
headline.print_headline: South Korea’s Leader Apologizes for Aide’s Behavior in U.S.
